title.narrative: Multitranche Financing Facility (MFF) - Uttarakhand State-Road Investment Program (Subproject 2)

description.narrative: Uttarakhand State Road Investment Program -Project 2 will help the State of Uttarakhand to (i) improve a sub-network of roads totaling about 898 kilometers; (ii) undertake business process re-engineering of Public Works Department (PWD); and (iii) increase PWD staff's asset management skills.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
4.1.Share of roads in good condition connected to NHDP and PMGSY roads increased from 10% to 30% by 2010
2.1.Routine maintenance cost reduced from $ 1,400 to $1,000 per km through area-wide PBCs by 2012
1.3.Increase in stage carriage permints issued from 15 to 20 per month by 2012
1.2.Increase in SRTC bus utilization rate from 200 to 250 km per bus per day by 2012
2.2.Avereage service life of periodic maintenance works increased from 3 to 5 years by 2012
1.1.Increase in number of goods vehicle permits issued from 600 to 750 per month by 2012
3.1.Road Board functional by 1 February 2009 and holds formal meetings to discuss user concerns
3.2.Exteral audits of financial accounts including procurement indicate full compliance with agreed procedures
